text: Blackmail is a 1947 American action crime movie directed by Lesley Selander and starring William Marshall, Adele Mara, Ricardo Cortez, Grant Withers, Stephanie Bachelor, Ray Barcroft, Gregory Gaye. It was distributed by Republic Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940s action movies Category:1947 crime movies Category:American action movies Category:1940s American crime movies Category:Movies directed by Lesley Selander
title: Blackmail (1947 movie)
